Package org.lwjgl.system.glfw

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ErrorCallback
    Instances of this interface may be passed to the SetErrorCallback method.
    ErrorCallback.Str
    Extends ErrorCallback with an alternative version that accepts a string.
    MonitorCallback
    Instances of this interface may be passed to the SetMonitorCallback method.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ErrorCallback.StrAdapter
    An ErrorCallback.Str adapter.
    ErrorCallback.Util  
    GLFW
    Native bindings to the GLFW library.
    GLFWgammaramp
    Gamma ramp.
    GLFWimage
    Image data.
    GLFWvidmode
    Video mode.
    MonitorCallback.Util  
    WindowCallback
    This class encapsulates callback functionality for all window-specific GLFW callback methods.
    WindowCallback.Event  
    WindowCallbackAdapter
    A WindowCallback adapter for convenience.
